author: minano
body: Now for CMSSW_8_0_X: 1. The monitor elements for Endcap: meMissingBlade_ and meValidBlade_ are now filled per panel. This allows to plot the HitEfficiency maps with more Granularity. The Hit Efficiency is showed per blade and panel for every endcap disk.  2. Functions getBlade and getLadder to read the Blade and Ladder with no dependence on detector geometry. Reducing existing hard code.
title: Fpix HitEfficiency Maps per Panel
